languages.text: Из многих отсеков докладывают о странных шепотах, проникающих в умы людей. Некоторые замирают в ужасе, другие впадают в буйство. Ворожба изменников Человечества обрушилась на корабль, но экипаж тверд и неустрашим!

There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!
languages.original_text: Из многих отсеков докладывают о странных шепотах, проникающих в умы людей. Некоторые замирают в ужасе, другие впадают в буйство. Ворожба изменников Человечества обрушилась на корабль, но экипаж тверд и неустрашим!

traits.locale_text: There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The renegade forces of the traitors to Humanity have descended upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The renegade forces of the traitors to Humanity have descended upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The renegade forces of the traitors to Humanity have descended upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The renegade forces of the traitors to Humanity have descended upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

languages.text: Zahlreiche Module melden ein seltsames Flüstern, das sich in die Köpfe der Leute schleicht und sie vor Angst erstarren lässt oder in Berserker verwandelt. Die Verräter an der Menschheit haben das Schiff verhext, aber die Crew bleibt standhaft und unerschrocken.
languages.original_text: There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

traits.locale_text: Zahlreiche Module melden ein seltsames Flüstern, das sich in die Köpfe der Leute schleicht und sie vor Angst erstarren lässt oder in Berserker verwandelt. Die Verräter an der Menschheit haben das Schiff verhext, aber die Crew bleibt standhaft und unerschrocken.

languages.text: De nombreux compartiments vous parviennent des rapports faisant état d'étranges murmures qui s'infiltreraient dans l'esprit des membres de l'équipage et provoqueraient chez certains une peur paralysante, chez d'autres une rage incontrôlable. Les traîtres à l'humanité ont usé contre le vaisseau de quelque vil maléfice, mais vos hommes tiennent bon et ne s'en laissent pas conter pour autant !
languages.original_text: There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

traits.locale_text: De nombreux compartiments vous parviennent des rapports faisant état d'étranges murmures qui s'infiltreraient dans l'esprit des membres de l'équipage et provoqueraient chez certains une peur paralysante, chez d'autres une rage incontrôlable. Les traîtres à l'humanité ont usé contre le vaisseau de quelque vil maléfice, mais vos hommes tiennent bon et ne s'en laissent pas conter pour autant !

languages.text: Recibes informes de numerosos compartimentos sobre extraños susurros que se introducen en las mentes de la gente, haciendo que algunos queden inmovilizados por el terror y otros enloquezcan. Los traidores a la Humanidad han desatado su siniestra brujería contra la nave, ¡pero la tripulación se mantiene firme y dispuesta!
languages.original_text: There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

traits.locale_text: Recibes informes de numerosos compartimentos sobre extraños susurros que se introducen en las mentes de la gente, haciendo que algunos queden inmovilizados por el terror y otros enloquezcan. Los traidores a la Humanidad han desatado su siniestra brujería contra la nave, ¡pero la tripulación se mantiene firme y dispuesta!

languages.text: 奇妙なささやきが人民の心に忍び込んでいること、ある者は恐怖が凍り付き、ある者は狂暴化するという報告が多くの区画来ている。人類の裏切り者たちが船へと魔術の呼びかけをしたが、クルーたちは揺らぐことなく、臆することもなかったのだ！
languages.original_text: There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

traits.locale_text: 奇妙なささやきが人民の心に忍び込んでいること、ある者は恐怖が凍り付き、ある者は狂暴化するという報告が多くの区画来ている。人類の裏切り者たちが船へと魔術の呼びかけをしたが、クルーたちは揺らぐことなく、臆することもなかったのだ！

languages.text: 报告声称，许多船员都听到了古怪的窃窃私语，有些人被吓得呆若木鸡，还有的人被吓得发了狂。尽管人类的叛徒对你的船施加了巫术，但绝大部分船员依然坚定无畏！
languages.original_text: There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!

traits.locale_text: 报告声称，许多船员都听到了古怪的窃窃私语，有些人被吓得呆若木鸡，还有的人被吓得发了狂。尽管人类的叛徒对你的船施加了巫术，但绝大部分船员依然坚定无畏！

languages.text: Birçok kompartımandan insanların zihinlerine sinsice girerek bazılarının dehşet içinde donakalmalarına, diğerlerinin de cinnet geçirmelerine neden olan tuhaf fısıltılara dair raporlar geliyor. İnsanlığa ihanet edenler gemide cadılığa başvursalar da mürettebat, kararlılığından ve cesaretinden hiçbir şey kaybetmiyor!
languages.original_text: There are reports from many compartments of strange whispers creeping into people's minds, causing some to freeze in terror and others to go berserk. The traitors to Humanity have called down witchcraft upon the ship, but the crew remains steadfast and undaunted!
